workshops.name: QuEMaLeS 2025
workshops.description: Workshop on Quality Evaluation of Machine Learning Software Systems
topics_of_interest: Quality models and metrics for ML-based systems
workshops.submission_format: Technical and experience papers: up to 12 pages, New ideas and short papers: up to 8 pages

workshops.name: PATH 2025
workshops.description: Promoting and Dealing with Advanced Technology in Healthcare
topics_of_interest: Secure data management and privacy in healthcare software
Ethical and regulatory issues in AI for healthcare
Evaluation methodologies and real-world case studies
workshops.submission_format: Regular papers: up to 12 pages, Short papers: up to 6 pages

workshops.name: A-SPPI 2025
workshops.description: International Workshop on Analytics for Software Product and Process Improvement
topics_of_interest: Analysis of software data to support decision making
AI and machine learning for software analytics
Teaching software analytics and process improvement
workshops.submission_format: Full papers: 8 to 12 pages, Short papers: 6 to 8 pages, Position papers: 4 to 6 pages, Panel proposals: 1 to 4 pages

submission_information: All submissions must be in English, original, and not under review or published elsewhere. Papers must conform to the Springer LNCS formatting guidelines.

promotion.registration: At least one author of each accepted paper must register for the workshop and present the work.
